On Aug 12, 2019, at 2:37 PM, Christine Murray (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov> wrote: fyi ----- Forwarded by Christine Murray/NYSD/02/USCOURTS on 08/12/2019 02:37 PM ----- From: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) To: "Lamine N'Diaye" (b)(6) @bop.gov>, <BermanNYSDChambers@nysd.uscourts.gov> Cc: (b)(6) @att.net>, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>, Michael Greco (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> Date: 08/12/2019 02:33 PM Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490

Good afternoon, Attached please find Warden N'Diaye's response to Your Honor's inquiry. Please let us know if you need further information.
